children.text: The cavity slide frames have not been fitted with trimmers to properly support the plasterboard at the internal corners.
It is a requirement of clause 4.4.3.1.3 Perimeter Fixing of Australian Standard AS 2589 Gypsum Linings - Application and Finishing, that
‘Fasteners shall be installed at 300 mm maximum centres at all internal angles, external corners and at openings’.

Given the spacing of the existing cavity slider frame members, trimmers will need to be installed so that the edges of the wall sheets can be securely fixed to the wall framing at their required centres.
